title: March Madness needs no renovation ; Old Lyme coach hears from an illustrious predecessor , and more
body_text:
Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...
What needs to be fixed with the NCAA Tournament? Try nothing. Old Lyme's state title gives Jim Calhoun reason to smile, dual champs at Notre Dame and more in the Sunday Read.
